title: 2018 Yt Tues Pro Race Carbon - XL
text:
Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. (Sized closer to a Large)

I bought this bike in April of 2021 and it was still BRAND NEW and UNOPENED from the factory in its original box and disassembled. 
Everything on the bike is carbon. The frame, swingarm, wheels, handlebars, cranks, derailleur, shifter even the seatpost. The bike weighs about 15.4kgs without pedals.


I had about 10-12 occasions of bike park riding on it at Highland Bike Park in New Hampshire, USA. Also 1 day at Hellsend, Stellenbosch, and that's it. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)

This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts). It has not been ridden since.

Included are some extras:
E*thirteen valves for tubeless setup
Factory ODI AG signature grips
Extra E*thirteen crank shoes
ODI race number board
Crank Bros. Stamp 7 pedals(with spare pins)
AM Camo frame protection on top tube, shock pivot and swingarm
and the owners manuals.

Also have a bunch of gear to sell separately(too much to mention) I'm 184cm and just about 80kg.

Price is firm, I'm in no rush to sell, I'm just doing it a great disservice by not letting it shred as it was meant to.

Cheers, Marten

title: Dual Suspension E-Bike For Sale (NEW)
text:
”Voted best E-Bike of the year: Bicycling Magazine”Darrvin’s design-build prowess on full-display. A dual suspension e-MTB that can keep pace with any of the top brands at an unbeatable price, without giving an inch to performance or quality. Simply the best-buy dual suspension out there.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South AfricaMODEL YEAR: 2023PRICE: Standard R86,495.00 | 2022 models @ R76,495 while stockFEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang M500 mid motor with 95Nm for added strength.High performance E-Bike optimized suspension fork from RockShox.Ultra reliable SRAM 1 x 11 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the ROVE packs more options than a Swiss army knife. SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN ROVE Lite Alloy 29er 140mmREAR SHOX: RockShox Deluxe Select+ RLFRONT FORK: RockShox 35 Gold 140mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang N/W 36t	CHAIN: KMC E11 Optimised	PEDALS: Low Profile Platform AlloyHEADSET: Headset Tapered Alloy CartridgeHANDLEBAR: Promax Trail 760mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax Trail 4 Bolt		GRIP/TAPE: Velo Sport	BRAKE SET: Tektro Hydraulic HD-M290 180mmHUB SET: NOVATEC Boost F & R	RIM: Double Wall 25mm 32hSPOKE: Stainless Steel 13g Black		TIRE: Maxxis Minion F&R TLR 29 x 2.50	REAR DERAILLEUR: SRAM NX 11 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: SRAM NX 11 Speed		GEARS: SRAM PG1130 11-42T		SADDLE: Velo Sport		SEAT POST: PROMAX SP2003 350/400SEAT CLAMP: PromaxBUY BRAND NEW, STILL BOXED...E-BIKE OF THE YEAR - BICYCLING MAGAZINE NOV/DEC 2022

Darrvin is a local e-bike company, formed by a bunch of old (er)-school off-roaders with decades of experience in the mountain-bike business. The Rove is their electric duallie ( they also have a hardtail and a gravel bike), and it typifies Darrvin's 'quality and affordability' ethos: a bomb-proof aluminium alloy frame and swingarm assembly, with a Rockshox Deluxe Select+ RL fork and a Rockshox 35 Gold rear shock for 140mm travel all round, driven by 11-speed SRAM NX gearing and powered by a 95Nm Bafang M500 motor.

It comes standard with a 560Wh internal battery, which gave us enough juice for nearly four hours of playing up and down our local trails, albeit mainly in Eco mode. (If you want more range, then a 700Wh unit can be fitted.)

The Rove is not as long or as slack as many other trail-focused e-bikes - you can't simply point and shoot down a technical drop - but the more compact geometry rewards you with a liveliness that's almost gone extinct in modern mountain bikes. It makes the Rove a fine bike for newcomers to electric-assisted trail riding, and a capable all-rounder that's also at home on faster, XC-style trails - or even gravel roads.

title: Mountain Bike, Cleats, Pump, Odometer, Helmet,  Saddle bag
text:
Hi - I am selling my hardly used Norco Fluid FS 3. This is a wonderful bicycle for anybody who wants to have a good time on the trails. I shall also include a Size 10 pair of Specialized cleats with the offer. 

Whats included in the purchase:
1x Norco Fluid FS 3
1x Tyre pump
1x Saddle bag with a puncture kit
1x Bottle holder
1× Odometer

The seat can be lowered or lifted up so even for smaller or taller people it will be good.  If your interested please let me know.Kind regardsCian

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. title: Giant Alliance XTC 26" Mountain Bike
text:
I'm selling my Giant Alliance XTC mountain bike in excellent condition. This is the carbon-alloy frame (M), meaning the bicycle is extremely lightweight (12 kg - 13 kg) compared to similar purpose bicycles. It is perfect for scenarios and tracks where you climb with or have to carry the bicycle. Dual Valve hand pump included.

Condition: Bicycle is in excellent condition and just serviced to be ready for sale. All parts and components in perfect working order. Very few scratches or marks on the paint. Only right-side foot pedal reflector cracked.

Reason for selling: I moved to the suburbs and rarely have time to go biking.

Other Specification:
Frame - Alliance Composite Carbon Alloy
Fork - Fox F100 AL100mm
Brakes - Shimano LX hydraulic disc
Wheels - Mavic X317 26“ rims, Shimano LX hubs

No more clashing of handlebars, seats etc. The inverted U support frame is a good size so supporting 29ers in the upright position is not a problem.Features:* Stable and convenient bike carrier for 50mm tow-bar/tow-ball mounting* NO Spanner required to mount or dismount the bike carrier* The bike carrier tilts back, giving trunk access without off-loading the bikes* Folds flat for easy storage* Lockable to tow-bar* Adjustable wheel holders with soft straps for accommodating most types of bikes* Suitable for carbon frame bikes with holder attached to the seat post* Vertical frame folds flat for easy storage, compact enough to be kept in the trunk of the car* Standard big round 7-pin power plug for the light board* Carries up to 4 bikes, 60kg load capacity* 1 Year factory warranty* CE certified* Original and patented design* Weight: 15kg* Dimensions: 110cm x 77cm x 18cmSKU: 14969

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. title: ELECTRIC MOUNTAIN BIKE STEP-THRU DESIGN
text: SPRINGBOK E-MTB HARDTAILRESERVE YOURS.DELIVERY DOOR-TO-DOOR BEFORE 25 DECEMBER 2022 TO ALL MAJOR CITIES* AND TOWNS*( *REMOTE AREA DELIVERIES: ADDITIONAL COURIER FEES MAY BE ADDED AT TIME OF DELIVERY)Consider Financing your Springbok with Yonda starting at R1089 per month.Model Name : SPRINGBOK (Hardtail e-mountain bike)Choose from 27.5" or 29" .Inspired by the Beauty, Strength and Agility of the SPRINGBOK.#1 The FrameMaterial : Alloy 6061Artwork: High quality enamel gloss with anti-rust treatment . Green and Black with White trims.Wheel / Fork type and size : 27.5" or 29"EU Frame safety standard-tested : EN15194.Available Sizes to choose from : Medium 17" , Large 19" , Extra large 21"#2 The MotorMotor is Protected inside the frame from outdoor elements - rain , mud ,direct sunlight and potential knocks from rocks or other objects during riding.Two protective alloy plates - one on either side of the frame/motor are removable for motor maintenance.Motor housing has Air flow holes on the underside of the frame ensuring an even flow of cool air during riding.Motor Plates further protect against salt spray & water splash - ideal for coastal regions.BBS and BBSHD motors are known to be notoriously quiet and torquey.Smooth Ride: Motors can be re-programmed from factory default settings to your own customizable parameters. This is one of the beauties of such a versatile ebike kit : the ability to Re-programme the settings to configures one's own personal preferences.Motor Fine-tuning : Riders own preferences for power, speed , pedal assist ( each of the 9 levels of PAS may be adjusted ) . Via a programming tool to suit each riders style and preferences.Motor swap : Swap out and upgrade or downsize motors as required and as your needs change.Choice of 3 Motors: Choose the motor for your SPRINGBOK that best suits you:A) Truck Run 250w Mid DriveTorque 70nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 25-28 km/h.If you are under 90 kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(B) Bafang BBS02B 500w Mid DriveTorque 85nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 32km/h.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences.If you are under 110kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(C) Bafang BBSHD 1000w M615 Mid drive.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences160nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS) . Average speed 45km/h.Freedom to ride at wider range of levels of power low ~ high.If you are under 160kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance even on the steepest of hills*

title: EMTB | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | ELECTRIC MTB | EBIKES MID DRIVE E-BIKES | HUB DRIVE | PEDELEC EMTB
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

title: Electric Bikes | e-MTB | Electric Bicycles | Mid drive ebikes | Hub drive e-bikes | E-bike adventure
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

text:
Used Adult scooter. 

CityGlide by NextSport is the premier line of cruising BIG WHEEL Scooters. Great for last mile commuting and perfect for just getting out and having fun! This Scooter is your first choice of transportation on the go. Its lightweight and low-to-the-ground deck structure and oversized polyurethane tires provide a stable smooth ride even on bumpy city side walks. On top of that, the easy folding mechanism allows you to take Cityglide any and everywhere. CityGlide is suitable for ALL AGES but it is the ideal scooter for adults and teens due to its comfortable ride height. Great for college students! SUPPORTS RIDERS up to 220lbs!Foldable, and with big 200mm Wheels, you may not be grabbing big air anytime soon – but you’ll get where you need to be, fast.

title: EMTB CONVERSIONS E-BIKE KITS CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE INTO ELECTRIC BIKE CHILLED SQUIRREL CAPE TOWN
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. Ask about our Nation-Wide Pick ups and Return Deliveries.Chilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

Michael

Give us a call and let us get you out there on the beach where you belong!!
